text: [Music]
this has to be the most time consuming
smash bros top 10 i've ever put together
and that's because accessing the hardest
spirits is nothing short of a chore i
had to play the whole campaign again
just for this video to be possible for
this list i felt it made the most sense
to complete each battle with the entire
skilled tree disabled and to always have
spirits turned off so i couldn't cheese
anything so with that said and without
further ado let's go
you may look at this fight first glance
against this giant metal bayonetta and
wonder how taboo is a four-star spirit
while bayonetta may not attack often all
of her hits are pretty hard and to the
point and it doesn't help that she's
metal which makes her hard to knock
around or that she's giant because that
just makes her hitboxes even more
ridiculous than they already are like
seriously her forward swinging punch
covers like half the stage but since
bayonetta is slow moving with some
practice you'd think you could just work
around her attacks right well think
again you also take sudden damage out of
nowhere so even if you manage to dodge
all our attacks for a while you'll still
get damage tacked onto you and this is a
stamina battle so in a way you're kind
of forced to do this under a time limit
with enough practice and the right
character you could probably complete
this without spirits or a skill tree but
you'd really have to grind it out for a
few hours if not longer
our next spirit battle hails from the me
plaza universe dark emperor you take on
a giant ridley that just so happens to
have super armor that alone should tell
you everything this is not going to be
for the faint of heart ridley is so
powerful that you'll go down in one to
three hits i'm not even exaggerating of
all the spirit battles he has to be one
of the hardest hitting characters to
take on but if that's the case why is he
number nine instead of being lower well
lucky for us ridley is a big guy that
attacks slowly and ungracefully here
with lucas i was able to keep hitting
him by jumping back and forth and he
didn't do anything about that i also had
the most blessed win of all time ridley
went in for a swing and just kind of
gave up when he missed but this is
something that's not likely to ever be
replicated again which should be kept in
mind just the fact that he has super
armor and you die in like three hits
makes him stupid hard to fight i even
miraculously survived this hit so i
could use a final smash with inkling and
that did absolutely nothing to help me
nothing at all and if you survive long
enough the actual dark emperor comes
into the fray to make your unbearable
scenario even more unbearable and to
think this whole time there's a me
trapped in the cage doing nothing to
help me if any of you find a key to let
them out can you let me know
[Music]
and we aren't done with giant characters
the hoho spirit brings us a charizard
that constantly breathes curry as if
that wasn't annoying enough to deal with
he's also incredibly strong like the
other spirits you can get smekeldorfed
in just a few measly hits i'm not even
sure if hours and hours of practice
would be enough to take out this
charizard because the curry never goes
away it's a struggle just getting
projectiles to hit him let alone actual
attacks oh and uh by the way fire and
explosion attacks aren't very effective
against this charizard so there goes
half of the viable characters that have
projectiles like that the only saving
grace is believe it or not the actual
stage the first transformation always
fades into the fire arena and for one of
my attempts the stage almost beat
charizard for me he was bouncing all
over the fire taking heaps of damage but
not quite enough for a ko the fact that
the stage itself is stronger than me
just further proves how important
spirits in the skilled tree are to
completing world of light this battle
will surely make your blood boil let me
tell you
now it's time for a group of fighters
the geno spirit sends you peach kirby
bowser mario and chic and the only
character you technically have to worry
about koi'ing is sheik that might not
sound too bad until you realize sheik is
the last character to spawn on the stage
and new characters only show up when you
knock out one of them and hey look at
that mario always starts with a green
shell because that's really fair you
always fight three characters at a time
so trying to juggle all of them while
you're a total weakling is a conquest
that likely won't be conquered with rob
i was able to get a couple spike kills
but it was really hard to pull off since
everyone is constantly ganging up on you
and you can't try to camp near the ledge
and pull characters your way because
there's a time limit so you gotta work
fast bowser was by far the most
obnoxious character his attacks were so
strong and had me dying at early damages
while the characters for the spirit
might not be as strong as the other ones
mentioned above i feel like i have less
of a sense of control here which makes
the overall battle more difficult
now it's time for the completely bs
spirit megaman.exe has you fighting
three mega mans on a stage where the
ground is electrified if you touch the
electricity you'll get stunned damaged
and are left wide open to be attacked
this is a battle where you really begin
to miss having spirits attempting to
fight these three strong mega man
characters while on top of the platform
is quite the dastardly feat since mega
man can attack from the bottom and you
can't you're at a huge disadvantage for
the entire battle the only chance i ever
felt like i had was when i could grab
items like a beam sword but that's the
equivalent of putting a band-aid on a
flesh wound now sure you only fight one
mega man at a time but they're
projectile based characters so they can
easily attack you from the bottom and
from a long distance the only good thing
i have to say is we're playing on the
battlefield variant of electroplankton
and not the normal stage thank god
let me tell you the gigamax spirit was
so powerful that it didn't actually make
me angry i was purely shocked of his
destruction and left with a complete
loss of words trying to fight off a
giant little mac with super armor is
something i wouldn't wish on my worst
enemy some of little mac's attacks will
ko you in one hit no i'm serious one
freaking hit earlier on i said that
ridley could be the strongest spirit
well this little mech might be even
stronger since he's faster and a bit
more agile the only idea i had to take
this guy out was to lure him near the
end of the stage and throw him into the
blast zone the problem was that of
course as his super armor i could never
throw him far enough away without him
killing me first or the throw just not
covering enough distance and what's
crazy is i never even saw little mac use
his final smash i don't want to know how
much damage he could output from that i
tried using characters with projectiles
but that just didn't really work because
he's too fast and his super armor made
it easy for him to run up and smack me
all around with enough attempts you may
be able to throw them into the blast
zone but i'm putting up the white flag
for this one screw this
[Music]
in order to earn yourself the dr wily
spirit you have to fight eight mega mans
and a dr mario in a stamina battle so
it's kind of similar to that other mega
man one from earlier this time though
the enemies are made of metal so they
aren't easy to knock around and there's
two at a time so you're usually gonna
find yourself stuck in a hit stun i
tried this fight for a while but i could
not figure out a strategy to even get
through the first two mega mans i had
some luck with inkling's roller but the
problem is all your attacks only do like
1-5 hp at a time that's a minimum of
like 20-30 attacks i'd have to nail
while the mega man's only have to hit me
like four or five times and keep in mind
there's eight of these guys on top of dr
mario afterwards this one is absolutely
brutal without spirits i'm really not
sure how you'd pull it off without
finding a character to just tease the
entire thing
[Music]
i'm gonna ask you to take a good hard
look at dry bowser's spirit battle
you've probably noticed that there's
fire covering the entire battlefield
right well what i see is a little bit of
pain a touch of sadness and even some
self-doubt the fire is even worse than
the electricity there was a morsel of
time with the electricity where you can
jump and avoid getting zapped that's not
the case here you touch fire once you
fly through the air and you take the
damage oh wait what's that bowser should
also breathe curry sure why not add to
my suffering and heck let's just have
bowser's defense improve over time just
cover my wounds in that salt and let it
burn the nerves out of my entire body
system so my only idea here was to
cheese the fight entirely with a few
characters like kirby or inkling but i
just didn't have any luck there may be
some other dumb way to do this battle
but like i've been saying you really
need spirits to even stand a chance here
the name isn't really lying you need to
be the boss to complete this without a
spirit we've gone through electric
fields in the fire but here is the worst
of the bunch the poisonous ground every
time you're touching the ground your hp
is gonna get drained and you're also
under a time limit zero suit samus just
so happens to have increased defense at
a high damage and her attacks are pretty
strong too and let me tell you combining
all these obstacles into a blended up
smoothie brings up a concoction that
smells and derives of disappointment and
grief at least with that electric level
you could stand on the platforms above
but there's just no mercy here your only
option is to stay on the ledge and try
to hit her with air attacks but good
luck even doing that the level pulls no
plugs for you it's either you enter the
fight with a spirit or die trying and
before we move on i wanted to quickly
bring up an honorable mention and that
is actually pauline spirit which is
probably the most infamous one in the
game you're put on
m and you have a minute and a half to
take out peach mario and dk constantly
get in your way and peach does a stellar
job running around avoiding you i was
really conflicted on where to put this
on the list and honestly it greatly
depends on how much luck you have i know
there's youtube videos where people use
the staff to knock her out in a few
seconds but obviously we don't have
spirits to help us i found that i always
win this battle with dumb luck like look
here peach just used her recovery at a
bad time and floated to her death and
besides you can grab items like the
timer which greatly help you mash damage
into peach you normally don't get that
kind of assistance even though 75m has a
bad stage at least it isn't covered in
fire or poison so i feel like this
spirit will kinda always be up to
interpretation for me but with that said
the number one pick absolutely deserves
to be number one
[Music]
with all the previous spirit battles at
the very least we're given a fragment of
a chance to fight back and earn the
spirit with keda you simply aren't if i
mispronounce that i'm sorry i don't play
fire emblem for most of the battle
there's a win that's so strong that no
character you play as even stands a
chance of surviving let alone getting
hits in on marth and lucina and marth
and lucina also have increased movement
so they can move around in the wind even
easier i tried this battle with several
characters and even as sonic i was not
able to withstand the wind i was
entirely held against my will the wind
carried me to places that i just
couldn't control i even tried hanging
out on the left ledge to knock them out
of the way but that was just me
forgetting that this would only benefit
myself since the win isn't a problem for
the cpus and with all that said thank
you guys so much for watching and i hope
you had a wonderful day until next time
i think it should be said that there was
like 25 spirits that could have easily
fit this top 10 this was honestly so
difficult to try to find the 10 hardest
ones so i'd love to hear your thoughts
in the comments
